page.title: 18RECREATION.
page.content: The following activities take place in the Institute: {TUESDAYS}a children's playgroup organised by mothers. {WEDNESDAYS}a mothers and toddlers group.Women's Institute meet every 4th Wednesday in the month.Derby and Joan club meet in the Old People's Community Centre on Eastfield Estate. {THURSDAYS}a keep fit class is run in the school hall. {FRIDAYS}a snooker club is held in the Institute.A Brownie/Guide group meet in the school hall. {SATURDAY/SUNDAYS}football,rugby football and model aeroplane clubs meet regularly on the new village playing field.
